items.Item1: Dragon Amulet Cleaver of the Elements VIII
items.strItemName: Dragon Amulet Cleaver of the Elements IX
items.strItemDescription: A golden axe of ancient design, harnessing the power of the elements. Visit the Black Market Moglin to upgrade this weapon. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.
